value:
Apparently there's a hero in this
castle who looks just like me?
I should go and greet them!

My crew's a chivalrous bunch!
Don't go lumping us in with
other pirates. We're different.

The Orgahil Pirates refuse to take on
dishonorable work. Assaulting the
innocent would go against our code!

Although gallant, a pirate is a pirate.
If I'm caught, I'll be hung, and I've
prepared myself for that fate.

My family is my crew. That's because
I don't know much about my past
before the captain picked me up...

Brigid of the Orgahil Pirates is here!
Want to hear about the pirate festival
from $Nf?

Did you just see that skill?!
What a feat!

Land or sea? I won't lose!
Doesn't matter the terrain.

The wind's blowing from the wrong
direction...

You're giving this treasure to me?
How generous of you!

My name is Brigid from the
chivalrous Orgahil Pirates.
Let's raise the sail and take off!

So, what do you think? Is a bona fide
pirate different from what you
expected, $Nu?$k$pEven though we go by that word, our
crew only takes from rich scoundrels.
Then we give it all to the needy!$k$pOur moral code is what sets us
apart from other pirates on the
sea. I take pride in it.$k$pWhen I see the look of appreciation
on the faces of those we help, I know
we did the right thing.$k$pAnd I plan to continue on this path
with the rest of my crew as the
leader of the Orgahil Pirates!
てやっ
Got you!
きゃああっ
What was that...!?
Enough out of you!
In the name of Orgahil!
I won't allow it!
You're in for a fight!
Blast...
Haha
My name is Brigid. I command the Orgahil pirates.
You've got guts. I'll give you that.
I won't prey on the weak. That's where I draw the line.
Keeping these ruffians in line is no easy task.
A pirate festival? You do know I'm a real pirate, don't you?
I recall precious little of my childhood.
You've got a good head on your shoulders. What would you say to joining my crew?
Aye-aye.
Are you serious?
I'm already there.
